## NIRawImage interface

Node interface for passing around raw image data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NIRawImage 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [data](./canvas-cleave.nirawimage.data.md) | <code>Buffer</code> | The raw image data. Length should be equal to info.size. |
|  [info](./canvas-cleave.nirawimage.info.md) | <code>NIRawImageInfo</code> | The raw image info. Refer to [NIRawImageInfo](./canvas-cleave.nirawimageinfo.md) for details. |
